name: password-manager-app
description: Personal Password Manager app. The "database" has to be created using a separate CLI tool

scripts.build-win: npm run build-assets && dotnet publish --self-contained -c Release -r win-x64
scripts.build-linux: npm run build-assets && dotnet publish -r debian-x64 -c Release --self-contained
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npx parcel watch src/site.js --dist-dir wwwroot/assets --public-url /assets" "dotnet watch run"

author: DkVZ
